page.title: 03CLUBS Pentney & Narboro'
page.content: Various organisations exist catering for the whole age range. A{Mothers & {Toddlers club}meets weekly in Pentney and a Playgroup meets two mornings a week in Narborough.{The Guides, {Brownies and Rangers}all meet regularly in Narborough. The thriving {Cricket and football clubs}are both situated at Narborough. The{Swaffham {angling club}fish the Bradmoor lakes and a{Water Ski club}uses the gravel pits. The{C.B. breakers}meet monthly at Pentney Abbey. A thriving{W.I. started forty years ago meets at Pentney and has 40 members.{The Ladies {Guild}meets fortnightly at the Church Centre, Narborough. An{Over 60's Club with 60 members has regular meetings at Narborough plus trips and parties. A{Fund raising committee}exists at Pentney to provide outings and parties for all the over 60's.
